articles.title: Japan's Nikkei 225 leads gains in Asia markets ahead of BOJ meeting; China shares rise for six straight days - CNBC
articles.description: The U.S. Federal Reserve will start its March FOMC meeting on Tuesday, while the BOJ and RBA will also be holding monetary policy meetings this week.
articles.content:
Japan's Nikkei 225 index led gains in Asia-Pacific markets on Monday, while China shares extended gains after data showed its economy kicked off the year on a strong note.
